glsa.title: libxml2: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: A off-by-one error in libxml2 could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project.

description.p: The "xmlXPtrEvalXPtrPart()" function in xpointer.c contains an off-by-one error.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user or automated system to open a specially crafted XML document with an application using libxml2, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libxml2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
